text: Ivar Jacobsen Norevik (26 March 1900 - 18 March 1956) was a Norwegian politician for the Labour Party. He was born in Lavik og Brekke. He was elected to the Norwegian Parliament from Sogn og Fjordane in 1945, and was re- elected on two occasions. Midway through the third term, he died and was replaced by Edvard Anderson Solheim. Norevik was deputy member of Kyrkjebø municipality council in the period 1937-1940\. ==References== * Category:1900 births Category:1956 deaths Category:Labour Party (Norway) politicians Category:Members of the Storting Category:20th-century Norwegian politicians
title: Ivar Jacobsen Norevik
